name: Dancing with the Waves
description:
~  ~  ~  ~  ~  ~  ~

Press SPACE to dance when the wave reaches its peak! 

Once you gain 30 points the game ends!

~  ~  ~  ~  ~  ~  ~

Created for the 2023 Peg Jam and the theme was Waves!

I didn't have a lot of time to make a game this weekend so I made this small thing in a day! Hopefully next year I have more time to make a fleshed-out game!

~  ~  ~  ~  ~  ~  ~
